code: import React,{useEffect}from"react";import{Carousel,Col,Image}from"react-bootstrap";import{useDispatch,useSelector}from"react-redux";import{Link}from"react-router-dom";import{getTopProducts}from"../actions/productActions";import Loader from"./Loader";import Message from"./Message";import Rating from"./Rating";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var TopProductsCarousel=function TopProductsCarousel(){var dispatch=useDispatch();var topProducts=useSelector(function(state){return state.topProducts;});var loading=topProducts.loading,error=topProducts.error,products=topProducts.products;useEffect(function(){dispatch(getTopProducts());},[dispatch]);return loading?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Loader,{}):error?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Message,{variant:"danger",children:error}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Carousel,{pause:"hover",controls:false,className:"mb-5 product-carousel",variant:"dark",indicators:false,children:products.map(function(product){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Carousel.Item,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Link,{className:"d-flex",to:"/product/".concat(product._id),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Col,{md:4,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Image,{src:product.image,alt:product.name,fluid:true})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Col,{className:"carousel-right d-flex align-items-center",md:8,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:product.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h4",{children:["$",product.price]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:product.description}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Rating,{value:product.rating,text:"".concat(product.numReviews," reviews")})]})})]})},product._id);})});};export default TopProductsCarousel;
